data.title: ASCIIMALS
data.statement:
You must modify the ASCII art animal <<ASCIIMAL>> according to the modifiers given in the input and then print the modified ASCIIMAL.

Modifier types:
{{close}}: Closes the eyes, changes all [[eye]] characters to {{-}}
{{blink}}: Closes the first eye from the left, changes first [[eye]] character to {{-}}
{{flip}}: Flips the ASCIIMAL horizontally, flips also characters {{/}}, {{\}}, {{(}}, {{)}}, {{<}}, {{>}}, {{{}}, and {{}}}

Remember! The remaining spaces on the right should be preserved when you print the answer.

(The following credits are not needed to solve the clash)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must modify the ASCII art animal ASCIIMAL according to the modifiers given in the input and then print the modified ASCIIMAL.

Modifier types:
close: Closes the eyes, changes all eye characters to -
blink: Closes the first eye from the left, changes first eye character to -
flip: Flips the ASCIIMAL horizontally, flips also characters /, \, (, ), <, >, {, and }

Remember! The remaining spaces on the right should be preserved when you print the answer.

(The following credits are not needed to solve the clash)
ASCIIMALS based on:
aardvark: https://www.asciiart.eu/animals/aardvarks
bat: https://www.asciiart.eu/animals/bats
camel: https://www.asciiart.eu/animals/camels

sheep:https://www.asciiart.eu/animals/other-land
snail: https://www.newgrounds.com/art/view/stonestoryrpg/ascii-snail-animations
turtle: https://www.asciiart.eu/animals/reptiles/turtles
Input
Line 1: eye character defining the eyes of the ASCIIMAL
Line 2: h height of the ASCIIMAL
Line 3: w width of the ASCIIMAL
Line 4: n number of modifiers
Next n lines: modifier modifiers
Next h lines: line line of the ASCIIMAL
Output
Modified ASCIIMAL
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 10
2 ≤ h ≤ 10
2 ≤ w ≤ 30
Example
Input
o
7
22
1
close
  __     __          
 /  \~~~/  \         
(    oo     )----,   
 \__     __/      \  
   )|  /)         |\ 
    | /\  /___\   / ^
    |/-|__|   |__|
Output
  __     __          
 /  \~~~/  \         
(    --     )----,   
 \__     __/      \  
   )|  /)         |\ 
    | /\  /___\   / ^
    |/-|__|   |__|
